short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block HTML Smuggling attacks and other unwanted downloads. Designed with enterprise configuration in mind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block HTML Smuggling attacks and other unwanted downloads. Designed with enterprise configuration in mind.

See https://github.com/SecurityJosh/DownloadBlocker for more information and configuration instructions.
long.fr:
A chrome extension which blocks downloads based on their file extension / origin. Can be used to prevent HTML smuggling attacks.

Designed for enterprise environments.

See https://github.com/SecurityJosh/DownloadBlocker for more information and configuration instructions.
